Articles.Content:
i've been playing ksp for the last few months. i'm currently working on my first mod. it's going to be a fuel/resource manager that will be perfect for refueling stations in orbit. you just add all your tanks to the resource manager and then you can use it to transfer resource in and out of your docked vessels. :3

i have some other ideas for mods i want to work on.

Howdy and welcome aboard!

Good luck with your mod! The world can always use another good resource manager.
Welcome aboard, cadet! I'm glad to hear there's a new modder on the loose, KSP is a wonderfully moddable game.
